page.title: 13SWAFFHAM BULBECK PLAYGROUP
page.content: Playgroup starts at 9 o'clock.In the playgroup you paint and play with toys.The playgroup have dolls,pretend cookers,a slide and lots more toys. You start playgroup at three years old and you leave at four years old. At playtime they go outside and play on bikes and on a little climbing frame and in a go-cart.Then they have some milk and a biscuit.Playgroup finishes at the end of the morning. The playgroup meets on Mondays, Tuesdays and Wednesdays in the Church Hall which is joined on to the School. Playgroup children use the School playground and toilets.
